name: ArtifactoryGenericDownload
description: This task downloads files from Artifactory
author: jfrog
helpMarkDown: Download artifacts from JFrog Artifactory using FileSpecs.

inputs.name: fileSpec
inputs.label: Spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: To specify the artifacts you wish to download from Artifactory, please create a File Spec.

inputs.name: collectBuildInfo
inputs.label: Collect Build Info
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you wish this task to collect build-info.
